text: Created hybrid memory system using JSON files for 100% reliability. Separate from YouTube knowledge base. Two systems: claude_memory (personal) and ai_workspace_memory (YouTube videos/research).

October 14, 2025 - FOUNDATION COMPLETE: Verified both memory systems working flawlessly. Claude personal memory is dual-layer (JSON+Mem0) and thread-safe with 11 memories synced. YouTube knowledge base is configured and ready. Vision documented in VISION_AND_ROADMAP.md. Next step: Build Crew.AI automation for YouTube data collection, then expand to scientific papers, industry reports, news, and social media sources.

MAJOR PROJECT: Consulting.AI - Building professional AI consulting platform. Key components: AI-Workspace (knowledge management), Crew.AI automation (multi-source data collection), secure memory system (client data protection), MCP server architecture (modular tools). All project planning, architecture decisions, and business strategy should remain private.
